name: Michelangelo

skills.name: Boo-Yah!
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. If either hit was critical, places a 50% Increase ATK buff on this Champion for 2 turns.

skills.name: Express Delivery!
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Before attacking, has a 75% chance of placing a 60% Decrease DEF debuff for 2 turns and a 75% chance of placing a Stun debuff for 1 turn. Will ignore 25% of the target's RES if the attack is critical. Then applies a Debuff Spread effect, taking all debuffs from the target and placing them on all enemies. Will ignore 25% of each target's RES if the initial attack was critical.
skills.notes: Debuff spread is powerful for AoE control.

skills.name: Shell Cyclone
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 50% Decrease ATK debuff and a Leech debuff for 2 turns. Will ignore 25% of each target's RES if the attack is critical. Then places a Taunt buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
skills.notes: Self-taunt and leech for survivability and team sustain.

skills.name: Party Dude
skills.description: [Passive Effect] Has a 15% chance to Evade an enemy skill and all of its effects. If this Champion is under a Taunt buff, the chance to Evade increases to 30%. Whenever Leonardo, Donatello, Michelangelo, or Raphael attacks, this Champion joins in that attack. [Active Effect] Places a Shield buff equal to 300% of this Champion's ATK on this Champion for 1 turn when they receive a hit.
skills.notes: Unique synergy with other TMNT champions. Shield triggers on every hit.

forms.aura: Increases Ally ACC in All Battles by 70.
forms.comments: TMNT event champion. Excels at debuff spreading and hybrid control. Synergizes with other Turtles.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Generally good AI. Will use debuff spread and taunt appropriately.

mechanics_advisory: Best used for debuff spreading and control. Synergizes with other TMNT champions for ally join attacks. Build for high crit rate and accuracy to maximize kit value.
